branchCategory.name: Valve (All Types)

branchItem.name: SY7000, 5 Port Solenoid Valve, All Types
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Fluid: air <LI>Operating pressure range: (internal pilot) 0.1 - 0.7MPa<BR>(external pilot) -100kPa to 0.7MPa<BR>(external pilot, pilot pressure range) 0.25 - 0.7MPa <LI>Effective area mm<SUP> 2</SUP> (Cv): body ported 10.6 (0.59);<BR>base mounted 12.6 (0.7) <LI>Coil rated voltage: 3, 5, 6, 12, 24VDC;<BR>100, 110, 200, 220VAC <LI>Response time (0.5MPa) w/o indicator light &<BR>surge voltage suppressor: 32ms or less <LI>Ambient & fluid temperature: 50°C </LI></UL>
